mapper.select: select tjrq as tjrq, czwdzxzqh as czwdzxzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_czfrs
select tjrq, xzqh, xzqhmc, sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_czfsl where tjrq =#{tjrq}
select tjrq, xzqh, xzqhmc, sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_czfsl where tjrq =#{tjrq} order by sl desc
select tjrq as tjrq, fldm as fldm, flmc as flmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_czfzdr
select tjrq as tjrq, czwdzxzqh as czwdzxzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfrs
select tjrq, xzqh, xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfsl where tjrq =#{tjrq}
select tjrq, sum(sl) as totle_fws, sum(sl) as totle_yhs, sum(sl) as totle_zgs from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfsl where tjrq between #{time} and #{time2} GROUP BY tjrq ORDER BY tjrq ASC
select tjrq, xzqh, xzqhmc, sl as totle_fws, sl as totle_yhs, sl as totle_zgs from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfsl where tjrq between #{time} and #{time2} and xzqhmc =#{xzqhmc}
select sum(sl) as totle_fws from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfsl where xzqhmc =#{xzqhmc} and tjrq <= #{time}
select sum(sl) as totle_fws from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfsl where tjrq <=#{time}
SELECT SUM(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfsl WHERE tjrq like '%' || #{time} ||'%'

select ( (select sum(sl) as sl from RPT_AQJG_QZF_qzfsl where tjrq like '%' || #{time} ||'%' and xzqhmc = #{xzqhmc}) - (select sum(sl) as sl2 from RPT_AQJG_QZF_qzfsl where tjrq like '%' || #{time2} ||'%' and xzqhmc = #{xzqhmc}) ) as num

select * from ( select qxmc.xzqhmc,(jt.sl-zt.sl) AS addNum from ( (select xzqhmc from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfsl GROUP BY xzqhmc) as qxmc LEFT JOIN (select sl,xzqhmc from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfsl WHERE tjrq = #{time2}) as jt on qxmc.xzqhmc = jt.xzqhmc LEFT JOIN (select sl,xzqhmc from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfsl WHERE tjrq = #{time}) as zt on qxmc.xzqhmc = zt.xzqhmc )GROUP BY qxmc.xzqhmc,addNum ) foo ORDER BY xzqhmc ASC
select ( (select sum(sl) from RPT_AQJG_QZF_qzfsl where tjrq <= #{time}) - (select sum(sl) from RPT_AQJG_QZF_qzfsl where tjrq <= #{time2}) ) as num
select tjrq, yhlxdm, yhlxmc, sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfyhfx where tjrq =#{tjrq} and yhlxdm between '11' and '20' order by sl desc
select tjrq, yhlxdm, yhlxmc, sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfyhfx where tjrq =#{tjrq} and yhlxdm between '21' and '28' order by sl desc
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzwzdr where tjrq =#{tjrq}
select tjrq, fldm, flmc, sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qzfzdry where tjrq =#{tjrq}
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhczfrs
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhczfzdr
select tjrq, xzqh, xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqzfsj where tjrq =#{tjrq}
select tjrq, xzqh, xzqhmc, sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqzfsj where tjrq =#{tjrq} order by xzqhmc
select tjrq, sum(sl) as totle_fws, sum(sl) as totle_yhs, sum(sl) as totle_zgs from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqzfsj where tjrq between #{time} and #{time2} GROUP BY tjrq ORDER BY tjrq ASC
select sum(sl) as num, yhlbmc from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhdlfx where yhlbmc is not null and tjrq=#{tjrq} group by yhlbmc order by num
select tjrq as tjrq, yhlxdm as yhlxdm, yhlxmc as yhlxmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayh
select tjrq, sbzs, sbwcs, sbwwcs from rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhsb where tjrq =#{tjrq}
select tjrq, xzqhdm, xzqhmc, fws, yhs, zgs, ceiling(zgs/yhs*100) as percent from rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhsj where tjrq =#{tjrq} order by yhs
select tjrq, xzqhdm, xzqhmc, fws, yhs, zgs, ceiling(zgs/yhs*100) as percent from rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhsj where tjrq =#{tjrq} order by xzqhmc
select sum(fws) as totle_fws, sum(yhs) totle_yhs, sum(zgs) as totle_zgs from rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhsj where xzqhmc =#{xzqhmc}
select tjrq, xzqhdm, xzqhmc, fws as totle_fws, yhs as totle_yhs, zgs as totle_zgs from rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhsj where xzqhmc =#{xzqhmc} and tjrq between #{time} and #{time2} ORDER BY tjrq
select tjrq, xzqhdm, xzqhmc, fws as totle_fws, yhs as totle_yhs, zgs as totle_zgs from rpt_aqjg_qzf_zayhsj where xzqhmc =#{xzqhmc} and tjrq between #{time} and #{time2} ORDER BY tjrq
select tjrq, sum(fws) totle_fws, sum(yhs) totle_yhs, sum(zgs) totle_zgs from rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhsj where tjrq between #{time} and #{time2} group by tjrq ORDER BY tjrq ASC
select tjrq, sum(fws) totle_fws, sum(yhs) totle_yhs, sum(zgs) totle_zgs from rpt_aqjg_qzf_zayhsj where tjrq between #{time} and #{time2} group by tjrq ORDER BY tjrq ASC
select tjrq, xzqhdm, xzqhmc, fws, yhs, zgs, ceiling(zgs/yhs*100) as percent from rpt_aqjg_qzf_zayhsj where tjrq =#{tjrq} order by xzqhmc
select tjrq as tjrq, qhdm as qhdm, qhmc as qhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_ldrklyds
select tjrq as tjrq, qhdm as qhdm, qhmc as qhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_ldrklydshi
select tjrq as tjrq, qhdm as qhdm, qhmc as qhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_ldrklydx
select tjrq as tjrq, nld as nld, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_ldrknlfx
select nld, sum(sl) as totleNum from rpt_aqjg_qzf_ldrksl where tjrq=#{tjrq} group by nld order by nld
select tjrq, xzqh, xzqhmc, nld, sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_ldrksl where tjrq=#{tjrq} ORDER BY xzqhmc,nld
select xzqhmc, sum(sl) as totleNum from rpt_aqjg_qzf_ldrksl group by xzqhmc order by totleNum desc
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_ldrksys
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_czfzdrs_xzqh
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, zsl as zsl, wcsl as wcsl, wwcsl as wwcsl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhff where tjrq =#{tjrq}
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, zsl as zsl, wcsl as wcsl, wwcsl as wwcsl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhrl where tjrq =#{tjrq}
select tjrq, xzqh, zsl, wcsl, wwcsl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhsh where tjrq =#{tjrq}
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, zsl as zsl, wcsl as wcsl, wwcsl as wwcsl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_fzayhza
select tjrq, xzqh, xzqhmc, ldrysl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_qyldrysl where tjrq=#{tjrq} order by ldrysl desc
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhczfzdrrs_xzqh
select tjrq as tjrq, zdrylx as zdrylx, zdrylxmc as zdrylxmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhczfzdrrs_zdlx
select tjrq as tjrq, fldm as fldm, flmc as flmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhczfzdr_lx
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhczwsj where tjrq =#{tjrq}
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqhdm as xzqhdm, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, pcsdm as pcsdm, pcsmc as pcsmc, yhsl as yhsl, yhfws as yhfws from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhfwpcs
select tjrq, zayh_fxsl, zayh_zgsl, fzayh_fxsl, fzayh_tssl, fzayh_zgsl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqs where tjrq between #{time} and #{time2} ORDER BY tjrq
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqzfrs
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqzfzdrrs_xzqh
select tjrq as tjrq, zdrylx as zdrylx, zdrylxmc as zdrylxmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqzfzdrrs_zdlx
select fldm as fldm, flmc as flmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqzfzdry
select tjrq as tjrq, fldm as fldm, flmc as flmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqzfzdr_lx
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqzwsj
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqzwzdr
select tjrq as tjrq, yhlxdm as yhlxdm, yhlxmc as yhlxmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_zayhlx
select tjrq, xzqhdm, xzqhmc, fws, yhs, zgs, ceiling(zgs/yhs*100) as percent from rpt_aqjg_qzf_zayhsj where tjrq =#{tjrq} order by yhs
select tjrq, sum(fzayh_fxsl) as totle_fws, sum(fzayh_tssl) as totle_yhs, sum(fzayh_zgsl) as totle_zgs from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqs where tjrq between #{time} and #{time2} group by tjrq ORDER BY tjrq
select tjrq, fzayh_fxsl as totle_fws, fzayh_tssl as totle_yhs, fzayh_zgsl as totle_zgs from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqs where tjrq between #{time} and #{time2} AND xzqhmc = #{xzqhmc} order by tjrq
select tjrq, xzqhmc, zayh_fxsl, zayh_zgsl, fzayh_fxsl, fzayh_tssl, fzayh_zgsl, ceiling(fzayh_zgsl/fzayh_fxsl*100) as percent from rpt_aqjg_qzf_yhqs where tjrq =#{tjrq} order by xzqhmc
select tjrq as tjrq, pcsname as pcsname, fxsl as fxsl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_zayhzg_fxsl
select tjrq as tjrq, pcsname as pcsname, wzgsl as wzgsl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_zayhzg_wzgsl
select tjrq as tjrq, pcsname as pcsname, zgsl as zgsl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_zayhzg_zgsl
select tjrq as tjrq, xzqh as xzqh, xzqhmc as xzqhmc, nld as nld, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_zdrysl
select fldm as fldm, flmc as flmc, sl as sl from rpt_aqjg_qzf_czfzdry
